src:
Jadi Menhan, Prabowo Mau Keliling Temui Menteri
07 Nov 2019, 14:30 by Anisa Indraini


Foto: Grandyos Zafna

Jakarta - Prabowo Subianto telah menyandang status baru sebagai Menteri Pertahanan. Prabowo menjabat sebagai Menteri Pertahanan sejak dilantik pada 23 Oktober 2019 yang lalu.Sebagai orang yang baru menjabat sebagai menteri, Prabowo berencana menemui satu per satu menteri dalam Kabinet Indonesia Maju untuk meminta masukan."Saya sering keliling ke semua menteri, semua nanti satu-satu saya minta masukan," kata Prabowo, Kamis (7/11/2019).Hal itu diucapkannya setelah dirinya menemui Menteri Koordinator Bidang Kemaritiman dan Investasi Luhut Binsar Pandjaitan di kantornya.Sebagai Menteri baru, dirinya meminta saran kepada Luhut yang sudah senior."Beliau ini kan senior saya, beliau Menko di bidang maritim, ya saya tentunya minta saran, minta pemikiran-pemikiran beliau," kata Prabowo di kantor Luhut, Kamis (7/11/2019).Simak Video "Tak Diambil Prabowo, Berapa Sih Gaji Menteri Pertahanan?"[Gambas:Video 20detik](eds/eds)
text:
So Minister of Defense, Prabowo Wants to Visit the Minister
07 Nov 2019, 14:30 by Anisa Indraini


Photo: Grandyos Zafna

Jakarta - Prabowo Subianto has held a new status as Minister of Defense. Prabowo has served as Minister of Defense since being inaugurated on October 23, 2019. As a new person serving as minister, Prabowo plans to meet one by one ministers in the Advanced Indonesian Cabinet to ask for input. "I often go around to all ministers, all later one by one I ask for input, "said Prabowo, Thursday (11/07/2019). He said that after he met with the Coordinating Minister for Maritime Affairs and Investment Luhut Binsar Pandjaitan in his office. As a new Minister, he asked for advice from senior Luhut." this is my senior, he is the Coordinating Minister for maritime affairs, yes I certainly ask for advice, ask for his thoughts, "said Prabowo in the Luhut office, Thursday (11/07/2019). Watch Video" Not Taking Prabowo, How Much is the Salary of the Minister Defense? "[Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (eds / eds)
